front.title: Traffic Engineering Extensions to OSPF version 3

abstract.t: This document describes extensions to the OSPF version 3 to supportintra-area Traffic Engineering [RFC2702]. The OSPFv3 protocol isspecified in [RFC2740].This document expands [OSPFV2-TE] to make both IPv4 and IPv6 networkapplicable. New sub-TLVs are defined to support IPv6 network. Useof these new sub-TLVs are not limited in OSPF version 3. They can beused in OSPF version 2.
